item.title: HTML5 'formaction' attribute - An easy Modernizr test
item.description:
EDIT NOTE: This no longer needs to be done outside of Modernizr. This was added to the Modernizr package about a month ago. Link to issue

I’ve been writing some Html Forms, and in playing with submit buttons came across an interesting attribute in the HTML 5 specs: formaction. The definition, from HTML Living Standard Doc

The action and formaction content attributes, if specified, must have a value that is a valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces. The action of an element is the value of the element’s formaction attribute, if the element is a submit button and has such an attribute, or the value of its form owner’s action attribute, if it has one, or else the empty string.
